text: The 2016 Nordic Golf League was the 18th season of the Nordic Golf League, one of four third-tier tours recognised by the European Tour. ==Schedule== The season consisted of 26 events. With the exception of a four-event Winter Series held in Spain, all official tournaments were held in Norway, Sweden, Finland, or Denmark. Although the ranking was calculated in euros, many prize funds were set in Danish krone or Swedish krona. {|class=wikitable sortable !Date!!Tournament!!Location!!Winner!!OWGR!!Prize fund |-
